title: Yasuo can ult Xayah out of her ult
body: Recently played Xayah and kept getting Yasuo ulted when I was in the air after using my ult. Seems like it shouldn't happen since I wasn't knocked up

replies.body: Further proof that yasuo is broken. xayah's ult is supposed to make her untargetable from literally _all_ attacks.

proof being what?

we haven't been shown a video, or even a replay of the bug happening

just one player claiming the bug exists.

it's 2017, the new client is here, the replays are in the game, it's a really easy system to use, so there should be _actual tangible evidence_.
The thing is: Yasuo's ult isn't a target ability. You do not need to click on an airborne person to ult them, you can just press it with your mouse anywhere in the ult circle
thats really more a bug than a gameplay issue, because not only is she untargetable which should make her impossible to ult but it also isnt a knockup any more than fizz's playfull/trickster
Video of that instance?
This ^ i clicked because I had to see this lol

Doesn't his ult basically target airborne unites even though they weren't knocked up? I don't think that's technically a bug. He'd just pretty much counter any unit that is airborne, even from their own abilities.

Then again, I'm a noob. Idk much about Yasuo and his ult.

As far as I know he can't ult Ziggs during his W or Blast Coned targets, so that should indeed be a bug. Those are probably exceptions made in his or their coding, as both spells are displacements, on which he usually can ult.
My guess would be that they used the knock-up coding for Xayah ult, to save on the animation, but forgot to exclude her from Yasuos ult targetting.
However, I've never seen this bug happening (and I've played my fair share of Yasuo games), so I can't tell for sure. Maybe it was a one time thing

When he was released, Riot clarified - only allied (to Yas) knockups count, though generally any forced movement (knockbacks, etc) also trigger it.  So Trist jumps, Ziggs blasts, and so on do not count.  Xayah should be in the same boat, as she technically isn't "airborne" even though her animation shows her being "up".  In a similar way, Trist cannot jump over a powerballing Rammus - she will get hit and fall out of the air, even though her model technically never visually touched.  (Learned that one the hard way when I started playing)
Xayah goes untargettable for her ult, so this would indeed be a bug.

It's less of a bug on Yasuo's end and more of a bug on Xayah's end.

I've noticed that status effects (not sure about any associated damage) will still apply to Xayah if it hits her during like the first 0.1 seconds of her untargetability.

I have been stunned by Leonas, rooted by Jhins, and snared by Morganas while in my ult, because it hit me as I began casting. I was stuck in place during the entirety of my ult's untargetability.

It's a Xayah bug, not a Yasuo bug.

I feel like this was intended, and that makes this more hilarious.
